Name: Antithesis Creed
Description: The Antithesis Creed is a jaded Periphery philosophy which coalesced in the wake of the Amaris Civil War. Followers of 'the Creed' believe that anything of distinctly Terran or Inner Sphere origin is immoral and contrary to the ideals of the 'Periphery'. The Antithesis Creed has been the foundation of many anarchist movements throughout the Periphery, including the Hyades Rim; these disaffected people see the Inner Sphere as a damning influence and wish to be rid of their presence, usually through violent means and joining forces with local criminal elements that they deem worthy of their cause.
ReputationStatements: The Creed recognizes Inner Sphere treachery. You stand in our path.
The Creed has looked into your abyss. Look yourself, for your path leads into ruin.
The Creed knows you. The Creed remembers. Do you remember the Creed?
The Creed knows you. The Creed will remember you. Does the Creed trust you? We'll soon know Commander.
The Creed knows you. Do you know the Creed? Are you willing to follow its teachings?
The Creed has looked into your abyss. Have you looked into ours?
The Creed recognizes those who are true to the Periphery by spreading our message.
MissionSuccessStatements: The Creed knows you. The Creed will remember you. The Creed trusts you.
GoodFaithFailureStatements: The Creed knows you. The Creed will remember you.
BadFaithFailureStatements: You will know the Creed. One day, you will know us.
